data.title: Best choice for Lunch!
data.text: The location is prime, conveniently close to Brickell avenue and parks to enjoy the view of Miami's financial district. The ingredients they use are very fresh and the flavors are fantastic. I always got their noddles with vegetables but their pizzas are fairly good as well. Clean trendy location and the price though a little on the expensive side is adequate. Please give it a try if you are on lunch break or just walking through Brickell!

data.title: Excellent Restaurant
data.text:
I love this place, everytime I go to Miami, I try to go for dinner, best pastas, carpaccio, pizzas etc.. The place is beautiful and it has great service (at least both times I went)..
I have not been able to find another Carpaccio as good as Varian's, it is simply delicious!!! Enjoy!

data.title: Omg
data.text: First timer here. Super upscale cafeteria kinda pasta, salads  n pizza. Most awesome..made to order pasta dishes. I recommend the Filetto Di Manzo con Vino Rosso...lol filet mignon pasta!

data.title: Good but average pizzas
data.text: I tried a couple of their pastas and they where very good for the price, the penne arrabiatta and the fettucini alfredo are very well prepared and the whole show kitchen adds on to the experience howver i rank them 3 stars because i tried their pizzas and you can really tell that its not their forte.. it tasted like the dough was premade or made by machine not by hand overall alright but defenitely not the best pizzas in town.. my suggestion would be go for the pasta!

data.title: Some good food
data.text: Food was very good. Portions were good. Service was quick. Pizzas were very scrumptious. Had the pannacota which was delicious.

data.title: A nice surprise!
data.text:
Being Italian, I do not like to eat pasta abroad, since it is very often poorly coocked: Vapiano was really an exciting surprise! Very good pasta made on the fly with personalized recipes very tasty.

The restaurant is really comfortable and the service real quick. Will come back surely.

I was impressed by the organization of the place and the I found valuable the American recipes, different from our italian but really not far away from a result point of view...

owner_response.author: MiriamSandra, Mktg. at Vapiano, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thanks for visiting us! We try our best to cook the original Italian way! We are also in Europe in case you visit us there one day:)
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Good quality food!! Good prices!! Nice ambiance.
data.text:
Good quality food!! 
Good prices!! Nice ambiance.
Fast cooking and service if tight for time @ lunch time.
Rissotto and Pizza must try.
Tomato Soup great!

owner_response.author: MiriamSandra, Marketing at Vapiano, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thanks a lot for coming to Vapiano! Thanks for your comments!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: So good!
data.text: My husband and I happened upon this place while visiting Miami and loved it! We went around 6:00pm on a Sunday night and it wasn't too crowded. We each got a pasta dish and both were great. So glad we decided to try it!

owner_response.author: MiriamSandra, Marketing at Vapiano, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thanks a lot for trying Vapiano, we are glad you enjoyed it! Hope you come back to Miami soon!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Great Place For Sunday Lunch
data.text: Went for a Sunday Lunch and was surprised that when we arrived around noon, which is close to their opening time, it was pretty empty but then filled up by 2pm.  The food is not bad and not ridiculously expensive.  If you like pasta, pizza and antipasto, this is your place.  The desserts are okay.....nothing special.  The restaurant reminds me of an upscale work cafeteria where you get your card, swipe at the station you're ordering from and pay at the end.  The food appears to be that type of quality as well as their primary customer base are probably white collar employees from the nearby office buildings.  The female bartender there that Sunday was quite cranky and offered poor customer service; however, the guys making the pasta were very friendly.  The plus for me was the service from the cooks and the ambiance, plus the full jar of gummy bears at the front!  Service at the bar though needs improvement.

owner_response.author: MiriamSandra, Marketing at Vapiano, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thanks for visiting Vapiano and for your detailed comments. We appreciate the feedback. Sorry for the moody bartender, she may have had a bad day, usually our team is very friendly and happy but they are all humans:) we will of course make sure to continuously train our bar staff to be in the right mood to serve our guests!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Fresh Italian Food
data.text: My first experience eating at Vapiano was in Europe 3 years back, was delighted to find out it opened in Miami, the concept is amazing, just go to counter and order anything you like from the menu, the chef will cook while you wait, fresh Italian food for great price, Highly recommended to try.

owner_response.author: MiriamSandra, Marketing at Vapiano, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thanks for visiting us! Indeed, we have more locations in Europe than in the rest of the world, you find over 136 Vapianos worldwide. In the US we are still growing, but we are happy you found us in Miami. Other locations are in Virginia, NYC, Chicago and DC. Thanks!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Excellent food
data.text: love it, good food, fresh and not so expensive. You can eat good pastas, pizzas or salads , the pastas are freshly made

owner_response.author: MiriamSandra, Marketing at Vapiano, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thanks for coming by! Yes, we make pasta, pizza and our dolci fresh everyday at Vapiano!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Cheap,good food in a cool place
data.text: I ate a very delicious pasta and a more delicious vegetarian pizza. The environment was very cool with big , top ,wooden tables. The staff was very helpful.

owner_response.author: MiriamSandra, Marketing at Vapiano, responded to this review
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Awesome local  Italian dining
data.text: Located in the heart of Brickell avenue, it is a favorite spot for locals, tourists and businessmen! The food is made fresh to your specifications in front of you . The staff is efficient and polite . The best part is every order is done in a fresh clean pan . Very suitable for vegetarians. The pizza is freshly baked . The cheese does contain rennet for those who are strict vegetarians.

data.title: No Waiters, Choose Your Dish, Table, Beverage and Bring It Yourself
data.text: The restaurant was not very busy so we had no problem finding a table. The food was very good and the chefs allow you to customize your entree' from what is on the menu...e.g. you could change the pasta type, the sauce, make it spicy, add garlic, etc... We would go back.

data.title: Inexpensive, sublime pasta.
data.text: A contemporary, well decorated Italian place with excellent dishes in the hear of Brickell. The quality is more than you pay for. With a buzzing crowd, it serves as a great place to go with friends. Keep in mind that there are no waiters, you have to stand up to get your food. They have a wide selection of pastas and different sauces to go with them.

data.title: Fun and great pizza
data.text: My husband, nephew and I were there on a Friday evening.  Our nephew knew how it all worked, so he talked us through it.  When you walk in you are given a credit card type card.  You look at the menu, and then go to the appropriate station to order your food.  At that time, you tap your card on the machine and you are given a pager to tell you when to pick up your meal.  My husband had a risotto that was different from what he expected, but it was ok.  Our nephew and I had pizzas that were excellent. Thin crust with generous toppings. We tried the dessert trio, but we were really too full to enjoy it.  When you are finished with your meal, you take the card to the cashier to check out.  This would be great for group dining...no pesky bill splitting...you pay for what you eat. We would definitely go back.  The food is good and it is affordable.

data.title: Good food, good vibe, good price!
data.text:
I visited Vapiano with some friends and I loved it. The restaurant was clean, neat and modern. The food was delicious with a very reasonable price. There were choices of pasta, pizza and salad. The staff and kitchen team were very friendly.

As I live by myself, I started to grab food from here on the way home. It is definitely a good place to go by yourself, with friends or do takeaways! Good food with affordable price, what else can you ask for for a casual dinner/ stay-in night?

data.title: Trendy but not expensive.
data.text: Pizza is how I like, thin bubbly crust with light charring.  I usually go with the margherita but they have a BBQ chix which is quite lovely.  Go with the Peroni draft beer, refreshing.  Place is very hip, with house/lounge music playing and everyone tryin to look cool.  Euro-chic layout, employees are very nice.  Prepare for long lines if you go with a pasta though.  I always order the pizza where there is never a wait to order.

data.title: Fun, casual, delicious and great price
data.text: The restaurant has a unique way of ordering by a "purchase card". Delicious food, friendly cooks and great environment!!

data.title: Excellent place and service!
data.text: Principally, I want to thank the manager, Michael;  for helping me to surprise my family with enthusiasm and joy. He is a great manager!
